mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FILE_INFO (FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_ORGNAME, FILE_EXIT, FILE_REG_ID, FILE_CHG_ID) VALUES (#{file_name}, #{file_path}, #{file_orgname}, #{file_exit}, #{file_reg_id}, #{file_chg_id})
INSERT INTO IMG_STUDY (FILE_SEQ, IMG_ANSWER, IMG_CONTENT) VALUES (#{file_seq}, #{img_answer}, #{img_content})
